languages.text: {n}На первый взгляд записи выглядят типичным отчетом о поставках, однако после некоторого изучения строк становится очевидно, что речь не о руде или деталях, а об {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментике{/g}, извлеченной из живых {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецов{/g}, и "отработанной массе" — плоти жертв, умерщвленных во время или ради машинных ритуалов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Лог о поставке деталей для форж финда — из кого, кого как пытали, дефицит

languages.text: {n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На первый взгляд записи выглядят типичным отчетом о поставках, однако после некоторого изучения строк становится очевидно, что речь не о руде или деталях, а об {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментике{/g}, извлеченной из живых {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}техножрецов{/g}, и "отработанной массе" — плоти жертв, умерщвленных во время или ради машинных ритуалов.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after some reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but augmetics extracted from living Tech-Priests, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

{n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after some reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but augmetics extracted from living Tech-Priests, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

{n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

{n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

{n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

languages.text: {n}乍看之下，这些报告似乎与普通的运输报告并没什么区别。但仔细阅读之后，就会发现这里运输的东西并不是矿石，也不是装配用的零件，而是从还活着的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术神甫{/g}身上摘下来的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，以及“被消耗的质体”，也就是在机械仪式中遭到杀害的那些受害者的肉体。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乍看之下，这些报告似乎与普通的运输报告并没什么区别。但仔细阅读之后，就会发现这里运输的东西并不是矿石，也不是装配用的零件，而是从还活着的{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技术祭司{/g}身上摘下来的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}，以及“被消耗的质体”，也就是在机械仪式中遭到杀害的那些受害者的肉体。{/n}

languages.text: {n}A primera vista, los registros parecen un informe de envíos cualquiera, pero tras leer un poco más se hace evidente que el sujeto no son minerales ni partes de montaje, sino {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} extraídos de {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} vivos y «masa gastada»: la carne de las víctimas asesinadas durante o por los rituales de las máquinas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A primera vista, los registros parecen un informe de envíos cualquiera, pero tras leer un poco más se hace evidente que el sujeto no son minerales ni partes de montaje, sino {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} extraídos de {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}tecnosacerdotes{/g} vivos y «masa gastada»: la carne de las víctimas asesinadas durante o por los rituales de las máquinas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}パッと見ると、記録はよくある出荷レポートのようだが、よくよく読めば、明らかに話の内容は鉱石だとか組立部品だとかではなく、生きた{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}から取り出した{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメント{/g}のものだ。「塊を使う」とは…機械の儀式中か、このときのために殺された被害者の肉のことに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パッと見ると、記録はよくある出荷レポートのようだが、よくよく読めば、明らかに話の内容は鉱石だとか組立部品だとかではなく、生きた{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}技術司祭{/g}から取り出した{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメント{/g}のものだ。「塊を使う」とは…機械の儀式中か、このときのために殺された被害者の肉のことに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Auf den ersten Blick wirken die Aufzeichnungen wie ein normaler Frachtbrief, aber bald wird klar, dass es hier nicht um Erz oder Bauteile geht, sondern um {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g}, die lebenden {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriestern{/g} entnommen wurden, und um "verbrauchte Masse" – das Fleisch von Opfern, die entweder während oder anlässlich von Maschinenritualen getötet wurden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf den ersten Blick wirken die Aufzeichnungen wie ein normaler Frachtbrief, aber bald wird klar, dass es hier nicht um Erz oder Bauteile geht, sondern um {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g}, die lebenden {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Techpriestern{/g} entnommen wurden, und um "verbrauchte Masse" – das Fleisch von Opfern, die entweder während oder anlässlich von Maschinenritualen getötet wurden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À première vue, les archives ressemblent à un rapport d'expédition ordinaire, mais à y regarder de plus près, il vous apparaît nettement qu'elles ne portent pas sur du minerai ou des pièces de rechange, mais sur des {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} arrachées à des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} vivants ou des « masses redondantes », terminologie qui désigne la chair des victimes tuées en vue de rituels dédiés aux machines ou pendant ceux-ci.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À première vue, les archives ressemblent à un rapport d'expédition ordinaire, mais à y regarder de plus près, il vous apparaît nettement qu'elles ne portent pas sur du minerai ou des pièces de rechange, mais sur des {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} arrachées à des {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}technoprêtres{/g} vivants ou des « masses redondantes », terminologie qui désigne la chair des victimes tuées en vue de rituels dédiés aux machines ou pendant ceux-ci.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kayıtlar ilk bakışta tipik bir nakliye raporu gibi dursa da devamını okuyunca ana fikrin cevher veya montaj parçaları değil, canlı {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahiplerden{/g} çıkarılan {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentler{/g} ile "zayi kütle", yani makine ayinleri için öldürülen veya ayin sırasında canı alınan kurbanların bedenleri olduğu ortaya çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}At first glance, the records look like a typical shipping report, but after further reading, it becomes apparent that the focus here is not ore or assembly parts, but {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augments{/g} extracted from living {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tech-Priests{/g}, and "spent mass" — the flesh of the victims killed either during or for the sake of machine rituals.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kayıtlar ilk bakışta tipik bir nakliye raporu gibi dursa da devamını okuyunca ana fikrin cevher veya montaj parçaları değil, canlı {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Tekno Rahipler{/g}den çıkarılan {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentler{/g} ile "zayi kütle", yani makine ayinleri için öldürülen veya ayin sırasında canı alınan kurbanların bedenleri olduğu ortaya çıkıyor.{/n}
